context.prev_sent: This cane originates from Kwa Zulu Natal in a town called Pietermaritzburg and is made by a small group of people from the Zulu tribe.
context.next_sent: The original nature of tribal art will be reflected by variances from the cane as shown, each piece of a specific style is similar, but not identical.

sent_text: Each cane is an "original" work of art, individually handmade, no two are exactly alike which adds to the value of each piece.
